record.field: ACT Blue 3 Meter LSZH SFTP CAT6A Patch Cable Snagless RJ45

ACT Blue 3 Meter LSZH SFTP CAT6A Patch Cable Snagless with RJ45 Connectors - designed for high-speed networking applications requiring reliable performance and superior shielding.
Key Features: - CAT6A S/FTP (Screened Foiled Twisted Pair) construction - 10 Gigabit Ethernet support up to 500MHz - Snagless boot design for easy insertion/removal - Blue LSZH (Low Smoke Zero Halogen) jacket - 3 meter length - Double shielded (overall foil + individual pair foiling) - 26AWG copper conductors - Gold-plated RJ45 connectors - Backward compatible with CAT6, CAT5e, and CAT5 - Reduced alien crosstalk (AXT) - Ideal for data centers, server rooms, and high-density network installations - 100% factory tested

LSZH (Low Smoke Zero Halogen) jacket provides: - Moderate resistance to common industrial chemicals - Resistance to mild cleaning agents and standard office environments - Protection against dust and particulates - Limited resistance to oils and solvents - Reduced toxicity and corrosiveness in case of fire
Double shielding (S/FTP) provides excellent protection against electromagnetic interference (EMI) and radio frequency interference (RFI).
Not designed for direct exposure to harsh chemicals, outdoor environments, or submerged applications.

IEC 60332-1 Flame Retardant IEC 60754-1 Zero Halogen IEC 61034-2 Low Smoke RoHS Compliant REACH Compliant ANSI/TIA-568-C.2 CAT6A ISO/IEC 11801 Class EA EN 50173-1 Class EA ETL Verified to TIA 568-C.2 CAT6A 10GBASE-T IEEE 802.3an Standard Compliant

Designed for indoor enterprise and data center environments with LSZH (Low Smoke Zero Halogen) jacket for enhanced safety in case of fire.
Double shielded construction (S/FTP) with overall foil shield and individual pair foil shields provides superior protection against EMI/RFI interference, making it suitable for electrically noisy environments.
Minimum bend radius: 4x cable diameter static, 8x cable diameter dynamic. Exceeding minimum bend radius may cause performance degradation.
Maximum installation tension: 25 lbs (110N).
Snagless boot design protects the RJ45 connector's locking tab during installation and removal, extending cable life in high-density environments.
Temperature performance tested to 75Â°C for extended operational use in equipment cabinets and high-density installations.
Not suitable for direct burial, outdoor applications, or plenum spaces without additional protection.
